page.title: 16Interview with the Russels
page.content: Mr and Mrs Russel have rented the shop and house for two years now. They both work in the shop but only Mr.A. Russel works in the upholstery business. They mostly sell newspapers and stamps,but also sell food, cigarettes and other things. As it is a small shop most people get their groceries in Castle Douglas and only get things like milk from the shop. Mr.A.Russel has had the upholstery business only four years. He covers antique chairs and other furniture. The mill beside the shop was used for grinding corn and was shut down in 1959 as it was uneconomical, no-one would work in it and it could not be used.
